name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Takanashi Kiara 4th Anniversary Live ~「MIRAGE」WITH A SURPRISE!？ #Kiara4years [0LoG81pLS8c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: The final segment of Takanashi Kiara's performance of 'Nice Type'.
Performance of the song 'Why Does a Heart Break?' by Takanashi Kiara and IRyS.
An MC talk segment between Takanashi Kiara and IRyS following their performance.

subtitles.original: Try if you want, I'll let you come inside my mind
subtitles.english: Try if you want, I'll let you come inside my mind

subtitles.original: Call it down, and let's go all night
subtitles.english: Call it down, and let's go all night

subtitles.original: Oh you look so nervous, what's wrong? Don't be polite
subtitles.english: Oh you look so nervous, what's wrong? Don't be polite

subtitles.original: Got you on your knees, I never claimed to be the nice type
subtitles.english: Got you on your knees, I never claimed to be the nice type

subtitles.original: I'm not the nice type, nah
subtitles.english: I'm not the nice type, nah

subtitles.original: Got you like that, oh
subtitles.english: Got you like that, oh

subtitles.english: Never claimed to be the nice type

subtitles.original: I miss you
subtitles.english: I miss you

subtitles.original: Didn't want to admit it if I do
subtitles.english: Didn't want to admit it if I do

subtitles.original: Always been close but far away
subtitles.english: Always been close but far away

subtitles.original: You go but then you stay
subtitles.english: You go but then you stay

subtitles.original: It's always been you
subtitles.english: It's always been you

subtitles.original: I guess we are different after all
subtitles.english: I guess we are different after all

subtitles.original: But it's shocking how far apart we grew
subtitles.english: But it's shocking how far apart we grew

subtitles.original: So I cut all the ties to play it safe
subtitles.english: So I cut all the ties to play it safe

subtitles.original: But you like playing games
subtitles.english: But you like playing games

subtitles.original: It's always been you
subtitles.english: It's always been you

subtitles.original: And somehow you're still here
subtitles.english: And somehow you're still here

subtitles.english: This feeling could kill me

subtitles.english: Somehow you're still here

subtitles.original: And this might take me out, take me down, take me apart
subtitles.english: And this might take me out, take me down, take me apart

subtitles.original: Oh I got it bad, got attached,
subtitles.english: Oh I got it bad, got attached,

subtitles.original: my imagination brings me right back to you
subtitles.english: my imagination brings me right back to you

subtitles.original: Always wanted all, when I fall, I fall hard
subtitles.english: Always wanted all, when I fall, I fall hard

subtitles.original: Oh baby tell me why, tell me why, tell me why does a heart break
subtitles.english: Oh baby tell me why, tell me why, tell me why does a heart break

subtitles.original: A heart break, a heart...
subtitles.english: A heart break, a heart...

subtitles.original: Tell me why does a heart break, a heart break
subtitles.english: Tell me why does a heart break, a heart break

subtitles.original: Oh baby tell me why, tell me why
subtitles.english: Oh baby tell me why, tell me why

subtitles.original: It's kind of painful, to tell the truth
subtitles.english: It's kind of painful, to tell the truth

subtitles.original: I should cry it out, but I don't usually do
subtitles.english: I should cry it out, but I don't usually do

subtitles.original: Some things don't change though, I'd make them if I could
subtitles.english: Some things don't change though, I'd make them if I could

subtitles.original: Cause I don't feel human, I wonder if you would
subtitles.english: Cause I don't feel human, I wonder if you would

subtitles.original: Yay!

subtitles.original: We can't wait to talk!
